#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long m,n;
    int r,countm,diff,l1,l2,temp,store,i;
    scanf("%lld%lld",&m,&n);
    while((m!=0)&&(n!=0))
    {
        countm=0;
        vector<int> v1,v2;
        while(m>0)
        {
            r=m%10;
            v1.push_back(r);
            m/=10;
        }
        while(n>0)
        {
            r=n%10;
            v2.push_back(r);
            n/=10;
        }
        l1=v1.size();
        l2=v2.size();
        if(l1==l2)
        {
            temp=0;
            for(i=0;i<l1;i++)
            {
                diff=v1[i]+v2[i]+temp;
                if(diff>9)
                {
                    countm++;
                    temp=diff/10;
                }
                else
                {
                    temp=0;
                }
            }
        }
        else if(l1>l2)
        {
            temp=0;
            for(i=0;i<l1;i++)
            {
                if(i<l2)
                    diff=v1[i]+v2[i]+temp;
                else
                {
                    diff=v1[i]+temp;
                }
                if(diff>9)
                {
                    countm++;
                    temp=diff/10;
                }
                else
                {
                    temp=0;
                }
            }
        }
        else
        {
            temp=0;
            for(i=0;i<l2;i++)
            {
                if(i<l1)
                    diff=v1[i]+v2[i]+temp;
                else
                {
                    diff=v2[i]+temp;
                }
                if(diff>9)
                {
                    countm++;
                    temp=diff/10;
                }
                else
                {
                    temp=0;
                }
            }
        }
        if(countm==0)
            printf("No carry operation.\n");
        else if(countm==1)
            printf("%d carry operation.\n",countm);
        else
            printf("%d carry operations.\n",countm);
        scanf("%lld%lld",&m,&n);
    }
    return 0;
}
